overview:
Angel Kelchev is an Analyst at Union Square Advisors. Prior to joining Union Square, Mr. Kelchev worked as an Analyst in the Global Technology M&A Group at Lehman Brothers. Mr. Kelchev has worked on M&A transactions for numerous high technology clients, including Cisco in its acquisition of WebEx Communications, as well as with several private equity firms.

A native of Pazardjik, Bulgaria, Mr. Kelchev is fluent in Bulgarian and has a working knowledge of Russian.
